short.ar: دردشة مباشرة لكل موقع! تحدث مع الأشخاص على نفس الموقع الذي تتواجد فيه.
short.am: ለእያንዳንድ ድረገጽ የቀጥታ ክፍለ-ነገር! ከአንዳንድ በአንድ ጣቢያው ላይ ያሉት ሰዎች ጋር ክፈለ-ነገር ይስራል።
short.bg: Чат на живо за всяка уебсайт! Чат с хората на същия сайт като вас.
short.bn: প্রতিটি ওয়েবসাইটের জন্য লাইভ চ্যাট! আপনার সাথে একই সাইটে থাকা মানুষদের সাথে চ্যাট করুন।
short.ca: Xat en viu per a cada lloc web! Xateja amb persones al mateix lloc que tu.
short.cs: Živý chat pro každou webovou stránku! Chatujte s lidmi na stejném webu.
short.da: Live chat for ethvert website! Chat med mennesker på samme site som dig.
short.de: Live-Chat für jede Website! Chatte mit Personen auf derselben Seite wie du.
short.el: Ζωντανή συνομιλία για κάθε ιστοσελίδα! Συνομιλήστε με ανθρώπους στην ίδια ιστοσελίδα.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US: Live chat for every website! Chat with people on the same site as you.
short.es: ¡Chat en vivo para cada sitio web! Chatea con personas en el mismo sitio que tú.
short.es_419: ¡Chat para cada sitio web! Chatea con personas en el mismo sitio que tú.
short.et: Reaalajas vestlus igale veebilehele! Vestle inimestega samal lehel.
short.fa: چت زنده برای هر وبسایت! با افراد در سایت خود چت کنید.
short.fi: Livekeskustelu jokaiselle verkkosivustolle! Keskustele ihmisten kanssa samalla sivustolla.
short.fil: Live chat para sa bawat website! Makipag-chat sa mga taong nasa parehong site gaya mo.
short.fr: Chat en direct pour chaque site web ! Discutez avec des personnes sur le même site que vous.
short.gu: દરેક વેબસાઇટ માટે લાઇવ ચેટ! તમારી જેમ જ સાઇટ પર લોકો સાથે ચેટ કરો.
short.he: שיחה חיה לכל אתר! שוחח עם אנשים באותו האתר שלך.
short.hi: हर वेबसाइट के लिए लाइव चैट! उसी साइट पर लोगों के साथ चैट करें जैसे आप.
short.hr: Live chat za svaku web stranicu! Čavrljajte s ljudima na istoj stranici.
short.hu: Élő chat minden weboldalon! Csevegj azokkal, akik ugyanazon az oldalon vannak.
short.id: Obrolan langsung untuk setiap situs web! Ngobrol dengan orang-orang di situs yang sama dengan Anda.
short.it: Chat dal vivo per ogni sito web! Chatta con le persone sullo stesso sito.
short.ja: どのウェブサイトでもライブチャット！あなたと同じサイトの人々とチャットしよう。
short.kn: ಪ್ರತಿ ವೆಬ್‌ಸೈಟ್‌ಗಾಗಿ ಲೈವ್ ಚಾಟ್! ನೀವು ಇರುವ ಸೈಟ್‌ನಲ್ಲಿರುವ ಜನರೊಂದಿಗೆ ಚಾಟ್ ಮಾಡಿ.
short.ko: 모든 웹사이트에서 라이브 채팅! 같은 사이트에 있는 사람들과 채팅하세요.
short.lt: Gyvas pokalbis kiekvienai svetainei! Pokalbiai su žmonėmis toje pačioje svetainėje.
short.lv: Tiešraides tērzēšana katrā vietnē! Tērzē ar cilvēkiem tajā pašā vietnē.
short.ml: ഓരോ വെബ്സൈറ്റിലും ലൈവ് ചാറ്റ്! നിങ്ങളുടെ സൈറ്റിൽ ഉള്ളപ്പോൾ മറ്റുള്ളവരുമായി ചാറ്റുചെയ്യുക.
short.mr: प्रत्येक वेबसाइटसाठी लाइव्ह चॅट! तुम्ही असलेल्या साइटवरील लोकांशी चॅट करा.
short.ms: Sembang langsung untuk setiap laman web! Sembang dengan orang di laman yang sama dengan anda.
short.nl: Live chat voor elke website! Chat met mensen op dezelfde site als jij.
short.no: Live chat for enhver nettsted! Chat med folk på samme sted som deg.
short.pl: Live chat dla każdej strony internetowej! Czatuj z ludźmi na tej samej stronie co Ty.
short.pt_BR: Chat ao vivo para qualquer website! Converse com pessoas no mesmo site que você.
short.pt_PT: Chat ao vivo para todos os websites! Converse com pessoas no mesmo site que você.
short.ro: Chat live pentru fiecare site web! Discută cu persoanele de pe același site ca și tine.
short.ru: Живой чат для каждого сайта! Общайтесь с людьми на том же сайте, что и вы.
short.sk: Živý chat pre každú webovú stránku! Chatujte s ľuďmi na rovnakej stránke ako vy.
short.sl: Živi klepet za vsako spletno stran! Klepetajte z ljudmi na isti strani kot vi.
short.sr: Uživo čet za svaku veb stranicu! Četujte sa ljudima na istoj stranici kao i vi.
short.sv: Livechatt för varje webbsida! Chatta med personer på samma webbplats som du.
short.sw: Mazungumzo ya moja kwa moja kwa kila tovuti! Ongea na watu kwenye tovuti hiyo hiyo kama wewe.
short.ta: ஒவ்வொரு இணையதளத்திற்கும் உரையாடல்! உங்களுடன் அதே தளத்தில் உள்ள மக்களுடன் உரையாடுங்கள்.
short.te: ప్రతి వెబ్‌సైట్‌లో లైవ్ చాట్! మీరు ఉన్న సైట్‌లో ఉన్న ప్రజలతో చాట్ చేయండి.
short.th: แชทสดสำหรับเว็บไซต์ทุกเว็บ! แชทกับผู้คนที่อยู่ในเว็บเดียวกันกับคุณ.
short.tr: Her web sitesi için canlı sohbet! Aynı sitedeki insanlarla sohbet edin.
short.uk: Живий чат для кожного веб-сайту! Спілкуйтеся з людьми на тому ж сайті.
short.vi: Trò chuyện trực tiếp cho mỗi trang web! Trò chuyện với mọi người trên cùng một trang.
short.zh_CN: 每个网站的实时聊天！与同一个网站上的人聊天。
short.zh_TW: 每個網站的即時聊天！與同一網站上的人聊天。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
🌐 Discover a new dimension of online interaction with chitt.chat! Instantly connect and chat with others who are browsing the same website as you. Whether you’re discussing a breaking news article, watching a YouTube video with others, sharing thoughts on a blog, or seeking advice on a tutorial, chitt.chat brings conversations to you, effortlessly and in real-time.

💬 **Key Features:**

- **Universal Chat Rooms:** No matter what website you're on, chitt.chat lets you engage in live discussions with others on the same page. Feel the pulse of active conversations wherever you are on the web.

- **Customizable Profiles:** Make your profile uniquely yours! Customize your information to connect with other users more meaningfully.

- **See Live User Count:** Curious about how popular a site is right now? View the number of active users on any site at any given moment, and join the busiest, most engaging discussions.

- **Site and Room Level Connectivity:** Choose your level of engagement. Participate in wide site-level chats or join room-level discussions for more specific interests and topics.

🔄 **Easy to Use:**  
Using chitt.chat is as simple as clicking an icon. Once installed, the tool seamlessly integrates into your browsing experience without any complicated setups or configurations. Start a live chat instantly!

🌍 **Be Part of a Global Community:**  
Join an ever-growing community of users who are eager to share, learn, and engage. From everyday enthusiasts to hardcore fans, chitt.chat lets you connect with like-minded individuals across the globe.

🔒 **Privacy and Security:**  
Your privacy matters to us! chitt.chat doesn't store sensitive user data.

Install chitt.chat today and transform the way you interact on the web! Live chat on every website is not just possible; it's one click away. Start engaging in meaningful conversations on your favorite sites right now! 🚀
long.en:
🌐 Live chat for any website with chitt.chat! Instantly connect and chat with others who are browsing the same website as you! Think of YouTube live chat, or Twitch live chat, but for any website! Whether you’re discussing a breaking news article, watching a YouTube video with others, sharing thoughts on a blog, or seeking advice on a tutorial, chitt.chat brings conversations to you, effortlessly and in real-time. 

**NEW**
Now chat with bots! LLM integration lets you chat with a bot!

💬 **Key Features:**

- **Universal Chat Rooms:** No matter what website you're on, chitt.chat lets you engage in live discussions with others on the same page. Feel the pulse of active conversations wherever you are on the web.

- **LLM integration:** No one in the room with you? Have a question? Just chat with the local large model, powered by gpt! It's got some short term memory so you can have a conversation!

- **Customizable Profiles:** Make your profile uniquely yours! Customize your information to connect with other users more meaningfully.

- **See Live User Count:** Curious about how popular a site is right now? View the number of active users on any site at any given moment, and join the busiest, most engaging discussions.

- **Site and Room Level Connectivity:** Choose your level of engagement. Participate in wide site-level chats or join room-level discussions for more specific interests and topics.

🔄 **Easy to Use:**  
Using chitt.chat is as simple as clicking an icon. Once installed, the tool seamlessly integrates into your browsing experience without any complicated setups or configurations. Start a live chat instantly!

🌍 **Be Part of a Global Community:**  
Join an ever-growing community of users who are eager to share, learn, and engage. From everyday enthusiasts to hardcore fans, chitt.chat lets you connect with like-minded individuals across the globe.

🔒 **Privacy and Security:**  
Your privacy matters to us! chitt.chat doesn't store sensitive user data.

Install chitt.chat today and transform the way you interact on the web! Live chat on every website is not just possible; it's one click away. Start engaging in meaningful conversations on your favorite sites right now! 🚀
